title: Take over Lease (5 months) -- Hell's Kitchen 2br
posting_body: ['Due to a work opportunity, I am planning a move and can no longer fulfill my 1-year lease, which began in March.', "The apartment is a 2 bedroom in Hell's Kitchen and one other (professional, LGBT/gay friendly) roommate will be here through the end of the lease.", 'The room is the larger of the two and it has been large enough for me to work from home in it while feeling comfortable.', 'Why the room is great:', '-Spacious closet', '-In-unit washer/dryer***', '-Dishwasher', '-Across from a park', '-Close to charming restaurants and fun bars', 'I have furnished the apartment and can sell you remaining furniture if you wish to keep any of it.', 'The room is great for someone who wants a low-stakes commitment to live in NYC for several months without committing to a full lease.', "You can get to know the city very well from Hell's Kitchen.", "You can also 'get your foot in the door' while looking for apartments in the long term!", 'Feel free to contact me for photos or questions.']
